name: Nitrux 3
install_guide_markdown:
# Nitrux Installation Guide

Nitrux uses Calamares installer with partitioning tools for custom setup.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download Nitrux 3 ISO from official SourceForge mirrors.

install_steps.title: Create Installation Media
install_steps.detail_md: Use Etcher, Ventoy, or similar tools to write the ISO to USB (4GB+ recommended).

install_steps.title: Boot from USB
install_steps.detail_md: Restart computer, enter BIOS/UEFI, set USB as boot priority.

install_steps.title: Run Calamares Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Select drive, partition layout, create user account, and click Install.

install_steps.title: Post-Installation Setup
install_steps.detail_md: Restart, update packages with apt, and install preferred applications via NX.

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: Respects user privacy. No telemetry by default.
